tripleplay.game
Class ScreenStack.SlideTransition

java.lang.Object
  tripleplay.game.ScreenStack.SlideTransition
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScreenStack.Transition
Enclosing class:
ScreenStack
public class ScreenStack.SlideTransition
extends Object
implements ScreenStack.Transition

Slides the old screen off, and the new screen on right behind.

init

public void init(Screen oscreen,

Description copied from interface: ScreenStack.Transition
Allows the transition to pre-compute useful values. This will immediately be followed by call to ScreenStack.Transition.update(tripleplay.game.Screen, tripleplay.game.Screen, float) with an elapsed time of zero.

Specified by:
init in interface ScreenStack.Transition

update

public boolean update(Screen oscreen,
                      Screen nscreen,
                      float elapsed)
Description copied from interface: ScreenStack.Transition
Called every frame to update the transition

Specified by:
update in interface ScreenStack.Transition
Parameters:
oscreen - the outgoing screen.
nscreen - the incoming screen.
elapsed - the elapsed time since the transition started (in millis if that's what your game is sending to ScreenStack.update(float)).
Returns:
false if the transition is not yet complete, true when it is complete. The stack will automatically destroy/hide the old screen when the transition returns true.
